comments:
Running Debug UI from HEAD

1.  Start debug session, open Registers View
2.  Expand something from the Registers View and select a field
3.  Bring another view to the top to cover up the Registers View.
4.  Switch Registers View to the top again.

It will result in the following exception.
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable

RegistersViewerState needs to check returned value from #((RemoteTreeViewer) 
viewer).getCurrentChildren(...).  If returned value is null, return null like 
ViewerState.
